name: secp256k1-zkp
description: Essential methods of the secp256k1-zkp lib exported to JS for handling Elements confidential transactions

scripts.configure: docker run -t -v $(pwd):/src --rm secp256k1-js emconfigure ./configure src secp256k1-zkp --enable-module-rangeproof=yes --enable-module-surjectionproof=yes --enable-experimental=yes --enable-module-generator=yes --enable-module-ecdh=yes
scripts.make-web: docker run -t -v $(pwd):/src --rm secp256k1-js emmake make install-web
scripts.test: npm run format:ci && npm run lint && npm run unit
scripts.bundle:test: npx browserify test/ecdh.browser.js  > ./test/ecdh.bundle.browser.js && npx browserify lib/index.js --standalone secp256k1 > ./test/bundle.browser.js

author: Vulpem Ventures
